page.title: 04HOME LIFE
page.content: On Fridays I get up, get washed and dressed then I go downstairs to get my breakfast. After that I make my lunch and drink and put them in my bag. I learn my spellings and I help my brother and sister get their shoes on. I put my own shoes and coat on then we all go to school. On the way I sometimes meet my friends Rebecca and Alison. When we get to school we wait for Karen then we go into the playground, when the bell goes we go in. We write out numbers in our Maths and English books then we do our spellings. After that we have hymn practice then we do our sums, I sometimes finish before the others so I can do sewing. Then it is first play. We then mark our sums. After lunch we finish giving in our marks, have last play, clear our desks, tidy up and go home at 3.20pm.
